synopsis.text: Tanya Degurechaff is a ruthless young soldier with blonde hair and blue eyes who has earned the nickname "Devil of the Rhine" due to her tactical prowess on the battlefield. However, she was not always a soldier - her soul originally belonged to a Japanese salaryman who angered a godlike being called Being X. As punishment, Being X reincarnated the man as a little girl named Tanya in an alternate world ravaged by magical warfare. Fueled by defiance against Being X, Tanya resolves to climb the ranks of the Empire's military and recreate the peaceful life she once knew. But her talent for strategy unintentionally transforms the Empire into a dominant global power. Now Tanya wages war on two fronts - against the Empire's enemies as well as Being X, who continues to test her resolve. Though just a young girl in appearance, Tanya remains as stubborn and ruthless as ever in pursuing her goals. Her clashes with Being X raise a disturbing question - who is truly the more evil entity?
